# Empirical Landscape of Democratic Resilience .tiny[(or the lackthereof)]

--

```{r, include=F}

library(ERT)
var <- c("country_name", "year",
         "v2x_polyarchy", "v2x_regime", "reg_type",
         "aut_ep", "aut_ep_subreg",
         "aut_ep_start_year",
         "aut_ep_end_year")

data <- ERT::get_eps() %>%
  select(var) %>%
  filter(year>1944) 


data2 <-
  data %>%
  arrange(country_name, year) %>%
  group_by(country_name) %>%
  mutate(
    finale = as.integer(year == aut_ep_end_year),
    episode = cumsum(finale)   # each block of years after a finale
  ) %>%
  group_by(country_name, episode) %>%
  mutate(
    event_year = if_else(finale == 1, year, NA_integer_)
  ) %>%
  mutate(event_year = if_else(finale == 1, year, NA_integer_)   # store event year only at the event row
  ) %>%
  fill(event_year, .direction = "down") %>%                # carry event year forward ONLY 
  mutate(
    post = if_else(is.na(event_year), NA_integer_, year - event_year)
    # result: pre-event = NA; event year = 0; then 1, 2, 3, ...
  ) %>%
  mutate(pre = - (aut_ep_end_year - year)) %>%
  mutate(prepost = ifelse(!is.na(pre), pre, post)) %>%
  filter(prepost > -4 & prepost < 7) %>%
  mutate(event_year = 
           ifelse(prepost<0, aut_ep_end_year, event_year)) %>%
  mutate(country_event = paste0(country_name, event_year)) %>%
  ungroup()


data3 <- data2 %>%
  group_by(country_event) %>%
  mutate(
    poly0 = ifelse(any(prepost == 0), v2x_polyarchy[prepost == 0][1], NA_real_),
    poly3 = ifelse(any(prepost == 3), v2x_polyarchy[prepost == 3][1], NA_real_),
    diff  = case_when(
      !is.na(poly0) & !is.na(poly3) & (poly3 - poly0 > 0) ~ "improve",
      !is.na(poly0) & !is.na(poly3) ~ "not",
      TRUE ~ NA_character_
    )
  ) %>%
  ungroup()

data3 <- data2 %>%
  group_by(country_event) %>%
  mutate(
    poly0 = ifelse(any(prepost == 0), v2x_polyarchy[prepost == 0][1], NA_real_),
    poly3 = ifelse(any(prepost == 3), v2x_polyarchy[prepost == 3][1], NA_real_),
    diff  = case_when(
      !is.na(poly0) & !is.na(poly3) & (poly3 - poly0 > 0) ~ "improve",
      !is.na(poly0) & !is.na(poly3) ~ "not",
      TRUE ~ NA_character_
    )
  ) %>%
  mutate(color = ifelse(prepost>=0, diff, "pre")) %>%
  ungroup()




```

### Distinction between .green[onset] and .pink[breakdown] resilience

- .large[.green[Does an autocratization episode start on a democracy?]]
- .large[.pink[Does an ongoing autocratization lead to a collapse of a democracy?]]

--
<br><br>
```{r, fig.align='center', fig.width=12, fig.height=4.5}

library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)

# Node positions & labels (with line break)
nodes <- tibble(
  label = c("Democracy", "Autocratization", "Regime\nCollapse"),
  x = c(1, 2.8, 4.6),
  y = 0
)

box_w <- 1.6
box_h <- 1.2

nodes <- nodes %>%
  mutate(
    xmin = x - box_w/2, xmax = x + box_w/2,
    ymin = y - box_h/2, ymax = y + box_h/2
  )

arrows_df <- nodes %>%
  arrange(x) %>%
  mutate(x_start = xmax, y_start = y) %>%
  mutate(x_end   = lead(xmin), y_end = lead(y)) %>%
  slice(1:(n() - 1))

# Draw base chart
p <- ggplot() +
  geom_rect(data = nodes, aes(xmin = xmin, xmax = xmax, ymin = ymin, ymax = ymax, fill = label),
            color = "white", linewidth = 1) +
  geom_text(data = nodes, aes(x = x, y = y, label = label),
            color = "white", fontface = "bold", size = 8, lineheight = 0.9) +
  geom_segment(data = arrows_df,
               aes(x = x_start, xend = x_end, y = y_start, yend = y_end),
               linewidth = 1.2, color = "gray25",
               lineend = "butt",
               arrow = arrow(length = unit(0.25, "cm"), type = "closed")) +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("Democracy" = "steelblue",
                               "Autocratization" = "sienna",
                               "Regime\nCollapse" = "firebrick")) +
  coord_fixed(1) +
  theme_void() +
   theme(legend.position = "none") 

# Add braces (curved lines)
p +
  geom_curve(aes(x = 0.5, xend = 3, y = -.75, yend = -.75),
             curvature = +0.3, linewidth = 1.2, color = "green") +
  annotate("text", x = 1.8, y = -1.25, label = "Onset resilience",
           fontface = "italic", size = 5) +
  
  # Top brace (covers last two) -- frown
  geom_curve(aes(x = 2.5, xend = 5, y = .75, yend = .75),
             curvature = -0.3, linewidth = 1.2, color = "red") +
  annotate("text", x = 3.75, y = 1.25, label = "Breakdown resilience",
           fontface = "italic", size = 5) +
    coord_cartesian(xlim = c(0.3, 5), ylim = c(-1.6, 1.6), clip = "off")


```

## .pink[Enablers] and .Blue[Bulwarks] (Boese et al.2021)

- .Large[.Blue[Judicial constraints on the executive]: <br>both onset and breakdown resilience. <br>Courts function as the “last bulwark”]

--

- .Large[.Blue[Democratic stock]: both onset and breakdown <br>thru institutionalizing norms and practices.]

--

-	.Large[.Blue[Econ development]: only onset & marginally]

--

- .Large[.Blue[Regional democracy levels]: only breakdown <br>and marginally] 

--

- .Large[.pink[Coups] – mostly onset]

--

- .Large[other stuff: .pink[economic crisis], .pink[polarization]]

# .Huge[**How can democracy be made .yellow[more] resilient?**]

--

# Cheeseman et al. (2024)

---

.full-width-blue[
# Enhancing Resilience
]
<br><br>

--

- .Large[Stronger .pink[institutional] guardrails] 
  - .large[stricter thresholds for changing core rules]
  - .large[strengthen institutional independence (courts, electoral commissions)] 
  - .large[more protection for marginalized groups: legitimacy `r fa("arrow-up")`]
  - .large[improve tools to counter disinformation]
  
--

- .Large[Central + local government resilience: more .green[linkages]]

--

- .Large[Country .red[contexts]: media literacy for some; civic education for others]

--

- .Large[Re-democratization: a tricky business as .Blue[rule-compliance] becomes difficult]
